0.text: Innate: Vladimir gains (3.3% bonus health) as  ability power and (160% AP) as  bonus health. These two bonuses do not stack with each other.
0.html: Innate: Vladimir gains (3.3% bonus health) as  ability power and (160% AP) as  bonus health. These two bonuses do not stack with each other.
markedPassages: ability power
bonus health

0.text: Active: Vladimir drains blood from the target enemy, dealing magic damage and  healing himself. He then generates a stack of  Bloodthirst over the  cooldown, which is displayed in his secondary resource bar.
0.html: Active: Vladimir drains blood from the target enemy, dealing magic damage and healing himself. He then generates a stack of Bloodthirst over the  cooldown, which is displayed in his secondary resource bar.
markedPassages: healing
Bloodthirst
cooldown

1.text: At 2 stacks, Vladimir gains  10% / 20% / 30% / 40% (based on level) bonus movement speed for 0.5 seconds, and enters Crimson Rush while the  Bloodthirst depletes over 2.5 seconds. The  Bloodthirst depletes 75% slower during  Sanguine Pool,  Tides of Blood, or  stasis.
1.html: At 2 stacks, Vladimir gains  10% / 20% / 30% / 40% (based on level) bonus movement speed for 0.5 seconds, and enters Crimson Rush while the Bloodthirst depletes over 2.5 seconds. The Bloodthirst depletes 75% slower during Sanguine Pool, Tides of Blood, or stasis.
markedPassages: 10% / 20% / 30% / 40% (based on level) bonus movement speed

2.text: Crimson Rush Bonus: Transfusion consumes all  Bloodthirst to deal  85% increased damage and heal Vladimir for an additional 30 − 200 (based on level) (+ 5% (+ 4% per 100 AP) missing health), reduced to 35% against  minions.
2.html: Crimson Rush Bonus: Transfusion consumes all Bloodthirst to deal 85% increased damage and heal Vladimir for an additional 30 − 200 (based on level) (+ 5% (+ 4% per 100 AP) missing health), reduced to 35% against minions.

minions

0.text: Active: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming  untargetable and  ghosted for 2 seconds. He also gains  37.5% bonus movement speed that decays exponentially over 1 second.
0.html: Active: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable and ghosted for 2 seconds. He also gains  37.5% bonus movement speed that decays exponentially over 1 second.
markedPassages: untargetable
ghosted
37.5% bonus movement speed

1.text: Enemies within the pool are dealt magic damage every 0.5 seconds over the duration and are  slowed by 40%. Vladimir  heals himself for 15% of the pre-mitigation damage dealt.
1.html: Enemies within the pool are dealt magic damage every 0.5 seconds over the duration and are slowed by 40%. Vladimir heals himself for 15% of the pre-mitigation damage dealt.
markedPassages: slowed
heals

2.text: Vladimir cannot use basic attacks nor abilities during Sanguine Pool, but he can still move. If  Tides of Blood is charging at the time of Sanguine Pool's activation, that ability may still be recast.
2.html: Vladimir cannot use basic attacks nor abilities during Sanguine Pool, but he can still move. If Tides of Blood is charging at the time of Sanguine Pool's activation, that ability may still be recast.
markedPassages: Tides of Blood
possibleConcerningAbilities: Vladimir cannot use basic attacks nor abilities during Sanguine Pool, but he can still move. If  Tides of Blood is charging at the time of Sanguine Pool's activation, that ability may still be recast.

0.text: COST: 2 / 4 / 6 / 8% (BASED ON CHARGE TIME) MAXIMUM HEALTH

Active: Vladimir  charges for up to 1.5 seconds, during which he increases Tides of Blood's damage over the first second of the channel, and becomes  slowed by 20% afterwards for the remaining duration. Tides of Blood can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or if it is  interrupted.
0.html: Active: Vladimir charges for up to 1.5 seconds, during which he increases Tides of Blood's damage over the first second of the channel, and becomes slowed by 20% afterwards for the remaining duration. Tides of Blood can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or if it is interrupted.
markedPassages: charges
slowed
interrupted

1.text: Recast: Vladimir unleashes a nova of 15 blood bolts around himself that each deal magic damage to the first enemy hit, increased based on charge time, up to the first second.
1.html: Recast: Vladimir unleashes a nova of 15 blood bolts around himself that each deal magic damage to the first enemy hit, increased based on charge time, up to the first second.

2.text: If Tides of Blood was charged for at least 1 second, enemies hit are also  slowed for 0.5 seconds.
2.html: If Tides of Blood was charged for at least 1 second, enemies hit are also slowed for 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: slowed

3.text: Enemies can intercept multiple bolts, but can be damaged only once.
3.html: Enemies can intercept multiple bolts, but can be damaged only once.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Enemies can intercept multiple bolts, but can be damaged only once.

4.text: If Vladimir is below 12% of his maximum health, Tides of Blood will not cost any health.
4.html: If Vladimir is below 12% of his maximum health, Tides of Blood will not cost any health.
possibleConcerningAbilities: If Vladimir is below 12% of his maximum health, Tides of Blood will not cost any health.

0.text: Active: Vladimir spreads a virulent plague at the target location that infects enemies hit for 4 seconds, increasing the damage they take from all sources by 10%.
0.html: Active: Vladimir spreads a virulent plague at the target location that infects enemies hit for 4 seconds, increasing the damage they take from all sources by 10%.

1.text: After the duration, the infection bursts to deal magic damage to all affected targets and, after a 0.4-second delay,  heal Vladimir for each infected champion, reduced by 40% for subsequent champions.
1.html: After the duration, the infection bursts to deal magic damage to all affected targets and, after a 0.4-second delay, heal Vladimir for each infected champion, reduced by 40% for subsequent champions.
markedPassages: heal
